trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ401_01819_SEQ_00<tab>Mogret is in desperate need of a bath.

TEXT_HEAVNZ401_01819_SEQ_01<tab>A popular moogle bathing spot has been taken over by half-fish, half-dragon monstrosities called hropkens. Slay three of them, scattering the beasts so Mogret can finally clean under her wings.
TEXT_HEAVNZ401_01819_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain the hropkens, although their odor still remains fresh in your nose. Return to Mogret and inform her that the waters are once again safe.

TEXT_HEAVNZ401_01819_SEQ_03<tab>Mogret is overjoyed at your news, and explains that she can't stand the smell of raw fish. She suggests that maybe <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> should also consider taking a dip in the waters.

TEXT_HEAVNZ401_01819_MOGRET_000_000<tab>Have you ever bathed in the waters to the northeast? Of course not, because a gang of burly hropkens has been attacking any who goes near them, kupo! If you were kind enough to slay a few, that might scare them away, giving me time for a dip in the waters.
TEXT_HEAVNZ401_01819_MOGRET_000_010<tab>Surely half-dragon, half-fish beasts don't need those waters like <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> do. Scare them away so I can finally get myself clean.

TEXT_HEAVNZ401_01819_MOGRET_000_030<tab>Many thanks, brave adventurer! Finally I can enjoy a bath without the smell of raw dragon-fish assaulting my senses. <sniff> ...Say, a dip in the waters might serve to, uh...<var 1A 02 /var>freshen<var 1A 01 /var> you up as well, kupo!
